price: 54. Et ils complotèrent mais Allah déjoua leurs complots, car nul mieux qu’Allah ne sait déjouer les complots.
arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ وَمَكَرَ ٱللَّهُۖ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمَٰكِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamakarū wamakara al-lahu wal-lahu khayru al-mākirīna
